about_the_game:
As a simulation idler building game, instead of traditional complex numerical frameworks, Tiny Isle focuses on a variety of unique crops design, hiding explorable things within this island world. In the early stages of the game, you'll embark on an exciting journey of discovery. Before you realize, your crops will be producing and transporting crystals in an orderly fashion—you'll have created a unique and vibrant island. Simply watching it won't feel boring, and you'll continue unlocking more crops, rearranging your island, and expanding endlessly!

🌸Use the collected crystals to unlock adorable, unique crops and try to make them work together.

🌙Admire your island at different times of the day and in various weather conditions, while uncovering more secrets about day and night, as well as the weather.

🐟Relax by fishing at the island’s shores. Catch fish for different species, and use them to earn rewards or display them in your ponds as decorations.

🧚Live alongside the fairies and enjoy their companionship. Remember to thank them for helping keep your island neat and organized.

🏭As the island’s designer, keep expanding and arranging new areas. Find the perfect balance between aesthetics and functionality.

name: Tiny Isle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Tiny Isle is a cozy idle simulation game where you manage a small island. Plant crops, collect crystals, and unlock new ones. Explore unique plants, magical fairies, changing weather, and catch some ugly adorable fish. Create a peaceful island that’s all your own and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.
